root: ^Spending my evening going to a study session rather than being home sleeping in my bed…
^I don’t even care if I pass the class anymore.
^You got this! We’ll all pass together.
^Maybe it’s not too late to quit while we’re ahead…
^Yeah, I’d like to sleep in your bed too rather than being here.

c-1: ^Too much energy… it’s too late for this.
c-2: ^With how much money I put into tuition, I can’t quit now.
c-3: ^Aren’t you deadly? Well again, that makes two of us.
g-0: ^Well anyway, effort is not my forte… maybe I can get a few minutes of rest in…
